metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3623 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was found in Linux Kernel. It has been declared asproblematic. Affected by this vulnerability is the function follow_page_pteof the file mm/gup.c of the component BPF. The manipulation leads to racecondition. The attack can be launched remotely. It is recommended to applya patch to fix this issue. The identifier VDB-211921 was assigned to thisvulnerability.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
